Title: Night of the Wolf
Plot: Allison tries convincing Devalos that she heard a witness misinforming a police sketch artist, making them look for the wrong man. Meanwhile, 6-year-old Bridgette's new playmate indicates that another member of the family can see the dead.
GuestStars: Anahi Bustillos, Brent Jennings, Elizabeth Penn Payne, Wayne King, Hunter Brochu, Lily Jackson, Saida Pagan, David Trice, Nicole Pano
